keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Adjudicate
keywords.description: If the target has Penance, immediately trigger the End of Turn effect of their Penance.

keywords.name: Auraflame
keywords.description: Auraflame damages a random enemy and is reduced by 1 after you play a card.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Blessing
keywords.description: Blessing cards are Unplayable Holy cards with Reckoning Effects

keywords.name: Blight
keywords.description:
Blighted creatures take damage equal to their Blight and reduce their Blight by 1 when they receive a debuff other then Blight.
Blight is reduced by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Chakra
keywords.description:
Chakra's are buffs with no duration which impart the associated Damage Type on to your Normal damage Strikes and Defends
You may not have more then 1 Chakra at a time

keywords.name: Channeling
keywords.description: At the start of your turn, play this from any location for it's cost with the same target if you played it the turn before.

keywords.name: Chi
keywords.description:
Chi is generated and spent by Windwalker cards, you may not have more than 5 Chi at once.
Excess Chi becomes Temporary Strength and Focus

keywords.name: Conduit
keywords.description: Stance : While in this stance increase the effectiveness of orbs by 5.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Cycle
keywords.description: Discard a card and draw a new card to replace it.

keywords.name: Cyclone
keywords.description:
Stance : Gain 3 additional Block from cards.
 Attacks deal 3 additional damage.
When you exit this Stance : Channel 1 Razor Wind.

keywords.name: Deflecting Scales
keywords.description: Deflecting Scales damages a random enemy and is reduced by 1 after you receive damage.

keywords.name: Divine [LightIcon]
keywords.description: Divine damage applies Penance equal to half the Unblocked damage it deals.

keywords.name: Divine Armor
keywords.description: Until lost, prevents damage before block.

keywords.name: Divine
keywords.description: Block : At the start of your turn, Heal for every point of this block you have.

keywords.name: Downdraft
keywords.description:
Stance : Gain 3 additional Block from cards.
Increases effectiveness of orbs by 3
When you exit this Stance : Channel 1 Jade Spirit.

keywords.name: Duplicate
keywords.description: Add an exact copy to your discard pile

keywords.name: Exile
keywords.description: Purge X cards in your Exhaust pile

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Faded
keywords.description: Cannot be Played or Upgraded.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Fading
keywords.description: Becomes unplayable after being played X times.

keywords.name: Fear
keywords.description:
Feared creatures deal 10% less and take 10% more damage per Fear to a maximum of 70%.
Fear is reduced by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Fire [FireIcon]
keywords.description: Fire damage is increased by your Fury.

keywords.name: Fire
keywords.description: Block : Applies Scorch to the Attacker.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Flux
keywords.description: When played, Cycle to up X Status or Rune cards in your hand and activate the listed effect for each one.

keywords.name: Frost [IceIcon]
keywords.description: Frost damage grants [IceIcon] Block equal to the damage it deals.

keywords.name: Frost
keywords.description: Block : Does not Decay at the start of your turn but applies weak to you at the start of your turn if you have any.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Fury
keywords.description:
Gained by playing Primal Cards.
Can be used instead of energy to play Storm cards.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Heat
keywords.description: Heat can be spent to play Status cards to Exhaust them and Activate Cycle activated effects and Cycled card's end of turn effects

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Holy
keywords.description:
Holy Cards are modified by Zeal.
Zeal increases damage and Block gain for Holy cards

keywords.name: Incantation
keywords.description: Exhaust up to X cards in hand, and attach the listed effect to this card

keywords.name: Infernal Watch
keywords.description:
Watched enemies take damage at the end of your turn.
Infernal Watch returns to you when it's target dies.
When you target an enemy while you have Infernal Watch give your Infernal Watch to that enemy.

keywords.name: Intensity
keywords.description: Intensity increases the damage dealt and Block gained from your next Spell.

keywords.name: Jade Spirit
keywords.description: Orb: Deals [DrainIcon] Damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Judgement
keywords.description: When you obtain 10 Judgement, Choose one : Gain 4 Strength Dexterity and Spell Power, deal 2 damage to enemies you Debuff, or Deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Lightning [ElectricIcon]
keywords.description: Lightning Damage applies Static equal to half of unblocked damage dealt.

keywords.name: Lightning
keywords.description: Block : Applies Static to the attacker when broken

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Mana
keywords.description: Mana is spent instead of Energy to play Spells

keywords.name: Martial
keywords.description: Martial cards count as Strikes and Defends.

keywords.name: Mastery
keywords.description: Increase the damage and Block of ALL copies of the next x cards you play by 2 for the combat

keywords.name: Miasma
keywords.description:
A bonus effect that triggers if at least one enemy is Poisoned.
Hostile Miasma Effects will target ALL Poisoned enemies.

keywords.name: Nimbus
keywords.description: Orb: Deals [ElectricIcon] Damage to random enemies and increases effectiveness.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Penance
keywords.description:
Creatures with 8 or more Penance lose 20 HP and 8 Penance at the end of their turn.
When a creature loses HP from Penance, it gains 8 Sinner’s Burden, increasing the HP lost from Penance

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Primal
keywords.description:
Primal Cards generate Fury equal to the energy spent when played.
Fury is spent to activate Storm Effects.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Radiant
keywords.description: Radiant cards have their secondary values increased by 1 for every X Zeal you have.

keywords.name: Rain
keywords.description: Orb: Grants Block and increases the number of cards effected when evoked, when Evoked reduces the cost of random cards in hand by 1.

keywords.name: Razor Wind
keywords.description: Orb: Deals [WindIcon] Damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Reckoning
keywords.description: Reckoning effects trigger whenever you receive damage while this is in your hand.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Rune
keywords.description: Rune cards are Primal cards that are Unplayable without Storm and have effects when Cycled

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Sealed
keywords.description: Sealed cards are improved whenever you Cycle a Status.

keywords.name: Sinner's Burden
keywords.description: Increases HP Lost from Penance.

keywords.name: Thedragonkin:Snekproof
keywords.description: Snekproof cards cannot have their costs modified by anything other then itself.
